21 Day Calisthenics

21 Day Calisthenics Workout

Week 1

(1) Day 1 – Legs & Glutes

  • 40 Jumping Jacks
  • 20 Lunges
  • 25 Squats
  • 10 Star Jumps
  • 10 Reverse Cross Lunges

(1) Day 2 – Arms & Abs

  • 15 Burpees
  • 10 Push Ups
  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 40 Mountain Climbers
  • 25 Leg Raises

(1) Day 3 – Triceps & Obliques

  • 40 Russian Twists
  • 15 Plank-to-Push up
  • 15 Bench\Chair Dips
  • 30-Second Plank
  • 40 Crunches

(1) Day 4 – Arms & Abs

  • 30 Shoulder Taps
  • 25 Leg Raises
  • 10 Push Ups
  • 40 Russian Twists
  • 45-Second Plank

(1) Day 5 – Total Body Workout

  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 15 Burpees
  • 25 Squats
  • 10 Star Jumps
  • 40 Mountain Climbers
  • 10 Push Ups

Week 2

(2) Day 1 – Legs & Glutes

  • 60s Frankensteins
  • 10 Squat Kicks
  • 10 Donkey Kicks (each leg)
  • 20 Floor Bridge
  • 10 Fire Hydrants (each leg)

(2) Day 2 – Arms & Abs

  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 10 Close grip push ups
  • 15 Shoulder Taps
  • 20 Sit ups w/ boxing punches
  • 20 V ups

(2) Day 3 – Triceps & Obliques

  • 40 Russian Twists
  • 15 Plank-to-Push up
  • 10 Bench\Chair Dips
  • 30s Side Plank (right side)
  • 30s Side Plank (left side)
  • 30 Heel Touches

(2) Day 4 – Arms & Abs

  • 15 Shoulder Taps
  • 25 Sky Touches
  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 40 Crunches
  • 25 Flutter Kicks

(2) Day 5 – Total Body Workout

  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 15 Burpees
  • 15 Squat Kicks
  • 10 Star Jumps
  • 30 Mountain Climbers
  • 20 Sit up w/ boxing punches

Week 3

(3) Day 1 – Legs & Glutes

  • 60s Frankensteins
  • 10 Squat Kicks
  • 10 Fire Hydrants superset w/ Donkey Kicks (each leg)
  • 20 Single leg floor bridge
  • 10 Star Jumps

(3) Day 2 – Arms & Abs

  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 10 Crunches
  • 15 Shoulder Taps
  • 25 Flutter Kicks
  • 10 Single leg V ups (each leg)

(3) Day 3 – Triceps & Obliques

  • 40 Russian Twists
  • 15 Plank-to-Push up
  • 10 Bench\Chair Dips
  • 30s Side Plank (right side)
  • 30s Side Plank (left side)
  • 30 Heel Touches

(3) Day 4 – Arms & Abs

  • 10 Pike Push Ups
  • 15 Sky Touches
  • 60 Boxing Punches
  • 20 Bicycle Crunches
  • 10 Heel Touches

(3) Day 5 – Total Body Workout

  • 60s Boxing Punches
  • 15 Burpees
  • 15 Squat Kicks
  • 10 Push Ups
  • 15 Crunches
  • 60s Plank
Strength Training
Introductory Workouts
Caleb Grant, 2023
